original_text: And it came to pass, when the priests that bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord were come up out of the midst of Jordan, and the soles of the priests' feet were lifted up unto the dry land, that the waters of Jordan returned unto their place, and flowed over all his banks, as they did before.
korean_text: 여호와의 언약궤를 멘 제사장들이 요단 가운데에서 나오며 그 발바닥으로 육지를 밟는 동시에 요단 물이 본 곳으로 도로 흘러서 전과 같이 언덕에 넘쳤더라

sentences.original_text: when the priests that bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord
were come up out of the midst of Jordan
and the soles of the priests' feet
were lifted up unto the dry land
that the waters of Jordan returned unto their place
and flowed over all his banks
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 제방 위로 넘쳐 흘렀습니다
